headline: Ulta Beauty (ULTA) Expands Board with Esteemed Leaders From Sephora and Amazon
summary: Ulta Beauty (ULTA) recently appointed Martin Brok and Stephenie Landry to its board, marking a significant focus on diversity and leadership experience. The company's stock saw a 26% rise over the last quarter, potentially influenced by a combination of these executive changes and broader market trends. Despite the S&P 500 facing declines due to investor concerns over interest rates, Ulta's positive movements may reflect investor confidence in its strategic direction, including reaffirmed...

headline: Sephora’s Former CEO Is Joining Ulta Beauty’s Board
summary: Martin Brok, former president and chief executive officer of Sephora, is joining the board of the U.S.-based retailer.

headline: Is Now the Right Moment to Consider Ulta After Its 25% Jump in 3 Months?
summary: If you have been watching Ulta Beauty's stock lately, you are not alone. Plenty of investors are sitting on the fence, wondering whether now is the moment to jump in or hold back. Over the past year, Ulta has rewarded shareholders with a strong 35.6% total return, and it is up a hefty 25.9% over the last three months, easily outpacing the broader retail sector. That said, it has also been a bit of a rollercoaster, with some short-term dips appearing alongside all the gains. These fluctuations...
